data.title: Abortion
data.meta_description: With respect to the abortion issue, would you consider yourself to be pro-choice or pro-life? Do you think abortions should be legal under any circumstances, legal only under certain circumstances, or illegal in all circumstances?

Recommended

Jun 13, 2024

Pro-choice voters are showing record-high intensity on the abortion issue, and the pro-choice segment of the public remains historically large.

Mar 14, 2024

A Lumina study finds 71% of current and future students consider state reproductive policies in college choices; 80% prefer states with greater access.

Jul 7, 2023

Most Americans favor abortion being legal to some degree, and a majority self-identify as "pro-choice."
